description: Nodes, content entities, config entities, pages... what? For people new to Drupal, and even those that have been around awhile, the weird naming of these things can be confusing. In this session, we will be learning about the different data structures in Drupal, how they work, and when to use them.
title: DrupalCon New Orleans 2016: Entities 101 : Understanding Data Structures in Drupal
